name: Rhythm Burst
description:
Hold and drag the cross-hair with rhythm, try to beat all coming cubes. Challenge different levels to get rewards, unlock new weapons and popular songs!

How to play:
- Use your finger to control aiming and break.
- Cube come with EDM music.
- Try not to miss any cubes to keep the game going and don't fire black objects.

Game Features:
- One-tap control, easy to play!
- Amounts of songs to satisfy different tastes!
- Enjoy the DJ and Hop music, relax in epic music!
- Background color change brings you a new experience every plays!

Come on! See what surprises each level brings to you. Kill your time at stay home, enjoy this superb beat game NOW!
